dataIdInfo.idCredit: Created by the geneGIS team: Dori Dick, Shaun Walbridge, Scott Baker, Dawn Wright

tool.name: MakeIndividualPaths

param.name: Selected_Feature_Class
param.dialogReference: The subset of your data from which unique individuals should be used to generate paths.

param.displayname: Source features (to link with selected individuals)
param.name: Source_Feature_Class
param.dialogReference: The full dataset to search for the selected individuals.

param.name: Output_Feature_Class
param.dialogReference: Output lines which contain each selected individual path as a separate feature.

tool.usage: Create individual paths, which link a selected set of individuals across all locations they have been observed. Assumes linear movement betwen locations.
